metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

The purpose of this workbook is to provide an overview of your Azure Snapshots resources.  [Please submit any issues ](https://github.com/dolevshor/Azure-Snapshots-Insights/issues) with the workbook template to GitHub.","style":"upsell"},"name":"text - Main Title"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources | where type == "microsoft.compute/snapshots" | where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value}) | where name in~ (split("{Snapshots:label}", ", ")) | extend TimeCreated = properties.timeCreated | extend snapshotType = case(properties.incremental == true, "Incremental", properties.incremental == false, "Full", "") | extend DeleteResource = id, SnapshotName = name, SnapshotId = id | extend IsActive = {EnableDeletion} | where TimeCreated < ago({SnapshotAge}) | extend Details = pack_all() | project id, sourceDisk = properties.creationData.sourceResourceId, diskSizeGB = properties.diskSizeGB, resourceGroup, location, apiVersion, sku = sku.name, snapshotType, TimeCreated, publicNetworkAccess = properties.publicNetworkAccess, networkAccessPolicy = properties.networkAccessPolicy, subscriptionId, tags, DeleteResource = iff(IsActive == true, DeleteResource, ""), SnapshotName, SnapshotId, Details","size":3,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"$gen_group","formatter":13,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"Resource","linkIsContextBlade":false,"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"id","formatter":5},{"columnMatch":"sourceDisk","formatter":13,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"Resource","showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"diskSizeGB","formatter":1,"formatOptions":{"copilotNudgeActionSettings":{"nudgeContent":"What
